job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: If you are a Software Engineer with experience, please read on! Top Reasons to Work with Us We are a global cloud base logistic company. Looking to as to our engineer team on working with our current platform and adding new features. What You Need for this Position At Least 3 Years of experience and knowledge of: - Python - Django - Postgres - Nginx So, if you are a Software Engineer with experience, please apply today! Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. Preferred Skills Python Django Postgres Nginx
